sen.j: 東野駅（ひがしのえき）は、京都市山科区にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Higashino Station is a railroad station on the Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line located in the Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City.
Higashino Station, located in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, is a railroad facility on the Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line.
Higashino Station, located in Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, is a railroad facility on the Kyoto Municipal Subway Tozai Line.

sen.j: 駅番号はT06。
sen.e: Its station number is T06.
Its station number is T06.
Its station number is T06.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しています。

sen.j: ホームは地下3層にあり、他の東西線の駅と同様、複線島式ホーム（1面2線）で、プラットホーム安全対策が設置されている。
sen.e: The platform, which is located on the third basement level, is a double-track island platform (one platform for two lines) with platform safety barriers, just like platforms of other stations on the Tozai Line.

The platform, which is located on the third basement level, is a double-track island platform (one platform for two lines) with safety barriers, similar to platforms of other stations on the Tozai Line.

The platform, which is located on the third basement level, is a double-track island platform (one platform for two lines) with safety barriers, similar to platforms of other stations on the Tozai Line.

sen.j: 東西線の駅は駅ごとにステーションカラーが制定されているが、東野駅のステーションカラーは藤色。
sen.e: Each station on the Tozai Line is assigned a unique station color and the color of Higashino Station is light purple.
Each station on the Tozai Line is assigned a unique station color, and the color of Higashino Station is light purple.
Each station on the Tozai Line is assigned a unique station color, and the color of Higashino Station is light purple.

sen.j: エレベーターは三菱製だが、京都国道事務所が管理する出入口3～6番のエレベーターはダイコー製。
sen.e: Elevators at the station are made by Mitsubishi, except for the ones at entrances 3 to 6 managed by the Kyoto National Highway Office, which are made by DAIKO.
The station's elevators were made by Mitsubishi; however, for those at entrances 3 to 6, managed by the Kyoto National Highway Office, were made by DAIKO.
The station's elevators were made by Mitsubishi; however, for those at entrances 3 to 6, managed by the Kyoto National Highway Office, were made by DAIKO.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しています。

sen.j: 主要交差点である、山科東野交差点がある。
sen.e: The Yamashina Higashino Intersection, one of the major intersections in the area, is located near the station.
The Yamashina Higashino Intersection, one of the major intersections in the area, is located near the station.
The Yamashina Higashino Intersection, one of the major intersections in the area, is located near the station.

sen.j: 山科東野交差点は国道1号と外環状線が交差している。
sen.e: National Highway 1 and the Kyoto Outer Loop Expressway cross each other at the Yamashina Higashino Intersection.
National Highway 1 and the Kyoto Outer Loop Expressway cross each other at the Yamashina Higashino Intersection.
National Route 1 and the Kyoto Outer Loop Expressway cross each other at the Yamashina Higashino Intersection.
sen.cmt: 国道→National Route としました。

sen.e: Higashino Katasagaricho

sen.e: Kokudo Higashino
Kokudo Higashino

sen.j: 東野
sen.e: Higashino
Higashino
Higashino

sen.j: 国道1号と外環状線の交差点の地下に位置し、バス輸送との連絡のために設けられることが決定した。
sen.e: The station, located beneath the intersection of National Highway 1 and the Outer Loop Expressway, was built to provide access to bus transportation.
The station, located beneath the intersection of National Highway 1 and the Outer Loop Expressway, was built to provide access to bus transportation.
The station, located beneath the intersection of National Route 1 and the Outer Loop Expressway, was built to provide access to bus transportation.
sen.cmt: 国道→National Route としました。

sen.j: 1995年（平成7年）7月31日 工事開始。
sen.e: Its construction was started on July 31, 1995.
Construction started on July 31, 1995.
July 31, 1995: Construction started.

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）7月31日 完成。
sen.e: The construction was completed on July 31, 1997.
The construction process was completed on July 31, 1997.
July 31, 1997: The construction process was completed.

sen.j: 東海道新幹線の地下をくぐる慎重な工事のため、京都市交通局が工事を手がけた東西線の駅では最も完成が遅れた。
sen.e: Due to the fact that the construction work required excavation beneath the Tokaido Shinkansen Line, the station was completed last among all the stations on the Tozai Line that were built by the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau.

Because the construction work required excavation beneath the Tokaido Shinkansen Line, the station was completed last among all the stations on the Tozai Line that were built by the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau.

Because the construction work required excavation beneath the Tokaido Shinkansen Line, the station was completed last among all the stations on the Tozai Line that were built by the Kyoto Municipal Transportation Bureau.

sen.j: 駅開業後、国土交通省の事業として、東野交差点地下道整備がなされた。
sen.e: After the opening of the station, the Higashino Intersection Underground Road was developed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism.
After the opening of the station, the Higashino Intersection Underground Road was developed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism.
After the opening of the station, the Higashino Intersection Underground Road was developed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism.

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）10月12日 東西線醍醐～二条間営業開始により開業。
sen.e: The station was opened on October 12, 1997, when the Tozai Line service between Daigo Station and Nijo Station was started.
The station was opened on October 12, 1997, commensurate with the launch of service between Daigo Station and Nijo Station on the Tozai Line.
October 12, 1997: The station was opened and commensurate with the launch of service between Daigo Station and Nijo Station on the Tozai Line.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: On April 1, 2007, PiTaPa cards started to be used.
On April 1, 2007, PiTaPa cards became available for use.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa cards came into use.
